```{r}
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
library(coda)
library(glue)
library(kableExtra)

samples <- read_csv("samples.csv") |>
    rename(Iteration = `...1`) |>
    pivot_longer(c("birth_rate1", "birth_rate2", "death_rate"),
        names_to = "Parameter",
        values_to = "Sample"
    )

truth <- tibble(
    Parameter = c("birth_rate1", "birth_rate2", "death_rate"),
    Truth = c(1, 4, 0.5)
)
```

## Traceplots

```{r}
#| fig-height: 6

left_join(samples, truth, by = "Parameter") |>
    ggplot(aes(Iteration, Sample)) +
    geom_line() +
    geom_hline(aes(yintercept = Truth, color = "red")) +
    facet_wrap(vars(Parameter), ncol = 1)
```

## Summaries

```{r}
samples |>
    group_by(Parameter) |>
    summarise(
        n = n(),
        ESS = effectiveSize(Sample),
        quantile_025 = quantile(Sample, 0.025),
        median = median(Sample),
        quantile_975 = quantile(Sample, 0.975),
    ) |>
    left_join(truth, by = "Parameter") |>
    mutate(
        `Relative error` = abs((median - Truth) / Truth),
        Coverage = quantile_025 <= Truth & Truth <= quantile_975
    ) |>
    group_by(Parameter) |>
    summarise(
        n = sum(n),
        ESS = sum(ESS) |> round(),
        `Relative error` = mean(`Relative error`),
        Coverage = glue("{100*mean(Coverage)}%")
    ) |>
    kbl(booktabs = TRUE)
```

## Densities

```{r}
#| fig-height: 6

left_join(samples, truth, by = "Parameter") |>
    ggplot() +
    geom_histogram(
        aes(x = Sample, y = after_stat(density), fill = "Posterior")
    ) +
    geom_vline(aes(xintercept = Truth),
        color = "red",
        linewidth = 1,
        linetype = "dashed"
    ) +
    lims(x = c(0, 6)) +
    scale_fill_manual(
        name = "",
        values = c("Posterior" = "steelblue")
    ) +
    facet_wrap(vars(Parameter), ncol = 2) +
    theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
